body.name: TOTO CST243EF#01 Entrada Two-Piece Round 1.28 GPF Universal Height Toilet, Cotton White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 55 mins
features: Clean, modern two-piece round bowl and tank set | Toilet seat is not included
Product dimensions – 26-5/8” D x 14-3/8” W x 30” H | Flush valve – 3-Inch Flapper Style | Rim size – 22-7/8” D x 12” W x 16-1/8” H | Rough-In – 12” | Tank size – 7.5” D x 15-1/4” W
ADA, WaterSense, CALGreen, and CEC compliant
E-Max 1.28 GPF flushing system, creates a powerful flush
Universal Height for more comfort across a broader range of individuals
body.description: Product Description The TOTO Entrada Two-Piece Round 1.28 GPF Universal Height Toilet offers a clean and modern high profile design. The Entrada bowl and tank set includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, and toilet bolt caps. The Entrada utilizes TOTO's E-max flushing system, featuring a 3” wide flush valve, extra-large siphon jet, and a large trapway. This reliable, highly efficient combination generates a powerful cleansing flush while only using 1.28 gallons of water. The Entrada is designed in TOTO’s Universal Height which allows for a more comfortable seat position across a wide range of users. This Entrada comes with a left-hand chrome trip lever. The Entrada is ADA compliant and meets the standards for EPA WaterSense, and California’s CEC and CALGreen requirements. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts, water supply lines, and toilet seat. From the Manufacturer Attention to detail, continuous improvement, over a thousand research and development professionals and 90+ years of experience fuel TOTO's product quality. TOTO provides unmatched performance, durability and reliability, representing the ultimate in customer satisfaction for our toilets, faucets, lavatories, showers and products for the entire bathroom. Superior quality backed by over 90 years of experience creates many benefits: Product quality and consistency thanks to our precision production operations, TOTO installations offer peace of mind and performance you can count on, Reliability translates into reduced maintenance costs and superior performance. Quality is one of TOTO's guiding principles in all of our operations both here in the U.S. and across the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy shipping, well packed, great in-use, easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This toilet has been great since day 1. There was a recommended seat which made things a breeze. We ended up going with the non-cut bolts which worked great. This toilet is sturdy and water efficient. Looks great and fit my space perfectly. I had an old and very low-sitting toilet before (which as a female I didn't mind the height). This has been a great transition and is the right compromise height for male and female squatters ;).I did price comparing with other sites and home stores - this was the best price.No issues with shipping. It was well packed!Installation was a breeze once we had the right bolts. I shouldn't have ordered the recommended one for those - just get them from the hardware store upon toilet arrival.My water bill is finally consistently lower!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact dimensions, good value
reviews.reviewText: My plumber was faced with a 31 year old Kohler that chronically leaked. He broke the bad news to me: "if you don't have oem parts, this thing will leak forever, Get a Toto." So I did. The bathroom is a small powder room sort of thing, needing room to open drawers in tight spaces. This was the best, and most cost effective, choice.Mission Accomplished. Cost 160, works well, and I'll update if things go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Saves water; flushes even the biggest "messes" ! Third one we've bought, that's how happy we are with it;Packaged great, plenty of foam to prevent breakage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT TOILET. BAD CUSTOMER TOILET.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toilet but customer service sucks. Toilet arrived in perfect condition but was missing the hardware and gasket to attach the tank to the bowl. Manual says that it is included. I went ahead and purchased the items that were missing. Cost about $14. I asked the seller if they would refund $10. It took them about a week to contact me. They said they would send me the hardware if I sent them a copy of the order. I had already done that in my first email. Two weeks later and I have never heard back from them. Eaven the TOTO name on the bowl was not straight. Cocked to one side. Other wise it is a good product. Just hope that you don't have a problem. Home centers sell the same item and will stand behind the sell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have used this model for six years and am very satisfied
reviews.reviewText: We installed one of these in our powder room six years ago, so when it was time to replace the 25 year old toilet that the builder installed in hour kids bath, I was very confident that we would be happy with this Toto toilet. They are made very well, and engineered to do a great job. The older toilet used more water, and clogged often, but this works well for the kids who don't always forget to hold the handle down for solids. These toilets have a partial flush, by quickly pressing the lever, or a full tank flush by holding the lever down until the tank is empty. I highly recommend this toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was excited to get Toto toilet for half of the regular price. Very disappointed when checked the toilet bowl. There were 3 patches-repairs on the bottom. Returned it next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have toilet will flush!
reviews.reviewText: I replaced a 20 year old toilet that used gallons of water per flush and had to be flushed twice to remove a "load".I was skeptical that a small amount of water could flush a toilet, but then as I mentioned I have not had a modern toilet until now. I was also concerned about having such a product delivered by UPS as I have had other lesser sized items damaged in transit. However, this was the most securely packaged product I have ever seen: foam around all sides and well designed packaging. The directions are clear for those who have never installed a toilet before, and did I mention that it flushes like a tidal wave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toilet great size.
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect toilet for a small bathroom. The plumber was impressed he even took a pictures he was so surprised I found it on Amazon. It flushes quickly with less water.I love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great toilet but keep in mind that as a round ...
reviews.reviewText: Great toilet but keep in mind that as a round toilet it's not " number two" friendly for men. Package was totally protected by expandable bagged foam works well and saves space
The best toilet and very good service . Thanks!!!!!
